category: I. The Lost Continent (Kumari Kandam) & Ancient Geography

questions.question: Into how many specific territories (Nadus) was the ancient Kumari Kandam divided, and can you name the seven major divisions?
questions.answer: It was divided into 49 territories. The seven major divisions were Ezhu Thenga Nadu, Ezhu Madurai Nadu, Ezhu Munpalai Nadu, Ezhu Pinpalai Nadu, Ezhu Kunra Nadu, Ezhu Gunakarai Nadu, and Ezhu Kurumpanai Nadu.

questions.question: Who ruled the "Monkey Land" and "Tiger Land" in the Salmala Dwipa before the Great Deluge forced them to migrate to India?

questions.question: What geological explanation does the text give for the "Seven Seas" mentioned in Puranas (Milk Ocean, Curd Ocean, etc.)?
